title: Thai BBQ pork
ingredients: ['1.5kg pork shoulder, trimmed of excess fat', '5 tablespoons sugar', '3 tablespoons honey', '3 tablespoons light soy sauce', '3 tablespoons whiskey', '2 tablespoons sesame oil', '2 teaspoons salt', '8 garlic cloves, finely chopped', '2 tablespoons finely chopped root ginger']
